duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the design, deployment, maintenance, and evolution of scalable enterprise network solutions at the Top Secret and SCI classification levels.
Provide technical and thought leadership to ensure integrity, availability, security accreditations, and strategic evolution of MITRE’s enterprise classified infrastructure.
Work in partnership with enterprise classified infrastructure programs and Global Security Services to provide technical leadership for the overall classified infrastructure.
Manage end user issues and provide top-level technical support and vision.
Provide task leadership for a small team that supports both the infrastructures and manages end-user issues.
Guidance for hardware/software purchases when requested and ensuring environment compliance and end-user requirements.
Collaborate to ensure enterprise classified infrastructure systems are meeting program deliverables, SLA's, and operational competencies.
Develop new strategies for classified environments and deploy all hardware/software configurations following established standards in an automatable and auditable method.

education_certification.credential: Master’s and or Bachelor’s Degree in Electrical, Computer, or Systems Engineering. Active DoD TS/SCI with full scope polygraph is required.
